SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:CoitalVocal.NAME: Moans of Pleasure
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:CoitalVocal.DESCRIPTION: Gain *Seduction *Block equal to !B! times (the number of enemies present + 1)
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:CoitalVocal.FLAVOR_SFW: Draw a card. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:ExposeSelf.NAME: Expose Yourself
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:ExposeSelf.DESCRIPTION: Remove !B! *Corruption. NL Until your next turn, when you take damage from attacks, gain half that amount as superstitiomod:Smeared Semen.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:ExposeSelf.FLAVOR_SFW: The situation is too unfavorable for our warriors. I need to regroup the troops.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:DrinkSemenBeer.NAME: Drink the Cum
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:DrinkSemenBeer.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain *Semen, also gain *Brew equal to its *Semen value. NL When you collect !M! *Brew or the battle ends, heal HP equal to your *Brew.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:DrinkSemenBeer.FLAVOR: Collect it in a cup and drink it down.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:DrinkSemenBeer.FLAVOR_SFW: Avoid the tiger in the morning, and the snake in the evening.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:Philter.NAME: Aphrodisiac
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:Philter.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Block. NL Gain *Plated *Armor equal to 1/!M! of the lost Block.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:Philter.FLAVOR: Best injected through the clit. Overdosing may cause uterine contractions.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:Philter.FLAVOR_SFW: So, you can complete the task without the shield.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:ChooseCoitalPost.NAME: Pick a Position
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:ChooseCoitalPost.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 random *Sex card to your hand. NL It costs 0 Energy this turn and gains Exhaust.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:GangBangPrepare.NAME: Gangbang Prep
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:GangBangPrepare.DESCRIPTION: When you play a *Sex card, gain its corresponding mark. After collecting 5 marks, automatically play a *Gangbang. NL For each unique mark beyond the base, *Gangbang's values increase by !M!%%.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:GangBangPrepare.FLAVOR: All of you at once? I can take it all~
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:GangBangPrepare.FLAVOR_SFW: Brave warriors, martial masters, angels who lead the masses... Descend, God of War Lü Bu!

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:PutEveryCumInBod.NAME: Cum Flood
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:PutEveryCumInBod.DESCRIPTION: Lose all superstitiomod:Spilled Semen and superstitiomod:Smeared Semen. Gain an equivalent amount of superstitiomod:Pleasure and superstitiomod:Internal Semen.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenBath.NAME: Semen Bath
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenBath.DESCRIPTION: Lose all *Semen. NL For each 1 point of *Semen lost, remove !B! *Corruption.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenBath.FLAVOR: Bathing in it feels so good. Filling a whole tub? Now *that’s* a challenge.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenLubricate.NAME: Slick with Cum
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenLubricate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL superstitiomod:Cascade: superstitiomod:Cum Hungry !M!: NL Play a non- *Slick with Cum attack from your draw pile.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenTattoo.NAME: Semen Scent
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenTattoo.DESCRIPTION: When you gain *Semen, NL gain *Seduction *Block equal to !M! times its *Semen value.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenMagic.NAME: Semen Magic
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:SemenMagic.FLAVOR: I’m a magical girl too—specialized in semen magic~

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:PrivatePhoto.NAME: Private Pic
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:PrivatePhoto.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! *Seduction *Block. NL Gain !M! instances of superstitiomod:Passion this turn.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:PrivatePhoto.FLAVOR: Oops~ I “accidentally” posted my ID and address with the pic… and the door lock’s “accidentally” broken too… whatever shall I do~❤

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:NudeLive.NAME: Nude Stream
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:NudeLive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! *Seduction *Block. NL Gain superstitiomod:Passion for !M! turns.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:Whipping.NAME: Whipping
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:Whipping.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL For every enemy dealt at least !M! damage, gain %d superstitiomod:Pleasure.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:NakedToSchool.NAME: Naked School Day
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:NakedToSchool.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! cards from your discard pile. Upgrade them and shuffle them into your draw pile.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:ZenState.NAME: Zen Mode
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:ZenState.DESCRIPTION: Remove !B! *Corruption. NL Choose !M! non-Exhaust cards from your hand to give Exhaust. Exhaust superstitiomod:Unplayable cards directly.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:ZenState.FLAVOR: Stay still... deep breaths… gotta keep this position while being pounded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Give Exhaust to up to %d cards.

SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:MeasureDick.NAME: Size Queen
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:MeasureDick.DESCRIPTION: Choose and *Discard up to !M! cards from your hand. NL If a card’s current cost is less than its original cost, gain [E] equal to the difference.
SuperstitioMod:LupaCard:MeasureDick.FLAVOR: Let’s see who goes in deepest~
